ygData.subject: Item Info Requests
ygData.msgSnippet: Requesting info on where the following weapons (all 2H blunts) can be attained. IE. Zone, Mob, and level needed (or any parts you know). Dragonbone Man-O-War
ygData.messageBody:
Requesting info on where the following weapons (all 2H blunts) can be
attained. IE. Zone, Mob, and level needed (or any parts you know).

Dragonbone

Man-O-War

Spiritists Hammer (From the stats on this baby, I'll bet it's Fear Plane...)

Any info on the GM given quest for Blued Two Handed Hammer as well.

Hrm...spoilers.. Well, how about a mammoth cloak. Lots know where it is, in
case ya don't, here ye be. Permafrost, goblin Alchemist, I believe he's
behind a rock that acts like a door somewhere close to the preacher. He's
roughly a 2 hour spawn I believe. Common drop is mammoth leggings, arch
backpack (6 large slots, -25% weight), and his rare is Mammoth Cloak (VERY
highly sought after item...). Buddy camped for 10+ hours the other night and
never saw the cloak. Solo, 35th level, group, high 20s full group.

-Leod
